fields.description: Changing this setting requires redoing the onboarding process, starting from CSR generation.
fields.label: Type of Business Transactions
fields.options:
Let the system decide (both)
Simplified Tax Invoices
Standard Tax Invoices

fields.description: Generate a CSR and make a compliance CSID request through ZATCA.
fields.label: Onboard

fields.description: The Name of the onboarded EGS unit on Fatoorah platform.
fields.label: Company Unit

fields.description:
ID of the onboarded EGS unit on Fatoorah platform. (unique)
Format: 
1-Solution Provider Name|2-Model or version|3-Serial

Example: 
1-ERPNext|2-15|3-1
fields.label: Company Unit Serial

fields.description: Use the compliance request from onboarding to get a production CSID from ZATCA, using which invoices can be submitted to ZATCA through reporting or clearance APIs.
fields.label: Get Production CSID

fields.description: Use the compliance request from onboarding to perform compliance checks for the different invoice types. This is a prerequisite to retrieving a production CSID
fields.label: Perform Compliance Checks

fields.description: If enabled, validates the generated ZATCA XML when creating Sales Invoice Additional Fields. This has a performance impact, so it's recommended to enable only for testing or troubleshooting problems.
fields.label: Validate Generated XML

fields.description:
The path to the executable for ZATCA CLI, e.g.
/home/frappe/zatca-cli/bin/zatca-cli
fields.label: CLI Path

fields.description:
The ZATCA CLI is an open-source tool used to generate CSRs, validate, and sign XML sales invoices sent to ZATCA.

Automatic: One-click setup downloads the CLI and Java 11 runtime from GitHub by default (configurable)

Manual: You manually deploy the CLI on the server as well as a Java 11 runtime and configure the path to the deployed CLI
fields.label: CLI Setup

fields.description: If left empty, the CLI will be downloaded from https://github.com/lavaloon-eg/zatca-cli/releases/. To override, place the full URL of a zip file from one of the releases (or a release you made from your fork)
fields.label: Override CLI Download URL

fields.description: If left empty, JRE 11 will be downloaded from https://github.com/adoptium/temurin11-binaries/releases/download/jdk-11.0.23+9/OpenJDK11U-jre_x64_linux_hotspot_11.0.23_9.tar.gz
fields.label: Override JRE Download URL
Download and Set Up ZATCA CLI

fields.description:
JAVA_HOME
path used for running the CLI. Leave blank to use the default system Java installation
fields.label: Java Home

fields.description:
Sandbox: ZATCA test environment
Simulation: Test environment requires OTP from Fatoorah platform
Production: ZATCA production enviroment
fields.label: Fatoora Server

fields.description: The VAT rate that will be added in the account, the created item tax template and the sales taxes and charges template
fields.label: Tax Rate

fields.description: The VAT category that will be added in the item tax template and the sales taxes and charges template
fields.label: ZATCA Tax Category
fields.options:
Standard rate
Services outside scope of tax / Not subject to VAT || {manual entry}
Exempt from Tax || Financial services mentioned in Article 29 of the VAT Regulations
Exempt from Tax || Life insurance services mentioned in Article 29 of the VAT Regulations
Exempt from Tax || Real estate transactions mentioned in Article 30 of the VAT Regulations
Exempt from Tax || Qualified Supply of Goods in Duty Free area
Zero rated goods || Export of goods
Zero rated goods || Export of services
Zero rated goods || The international transport of Goods
Zero rated goods || International transport of passengers
Zero rated goods || Services directly connected and incidental to a Supply of international passenger transport
Zero rated goods || Supply of a qualifying means of transport
Zero rated goods || Any services relating to Goods or passenger transportation as defined in article twenty five of these Regulations
Zero rated goods || Medicines and medical equipment
Zero rated goods || Qualifying metals
Zero rated goods || Private education to citizen
Zero rated goods || Private healthcare to citizen
Zero rated goods || Supply of qualified military goods

fields.description:
The Parent "Duties and Taxes"
This account is the responsible account for the VAT transactions.
fields.label: Account Name

fields.description:
The number that will be added to the account name.
For example: 2301 - VAT
fields.label: Account Number

fields.description:
If enabled, submission of sales invoices that produce invalid XML will be blocked.
Requires ZATCA CLI 2.1.0 or later
fields.label: Block Invoice on Invalid XML

fields.description:
Creates tax account under Duties and Taxes.
Creates Tax Category, Sales Taxes and Charges Template and Item Wise Tax Template.
fields.label: Automatic VAT Account Configuration

fields.description:
Enable in case of multiple branches with different commercial registration number.
Warning: This requires manual configuration of an Accounting Dimension for company branches.
fields.label: Enable Branch Configuration
